title: Emerald Grace Diamond Jhumka - A Timeless Heirloom
materials: pear shaped emeralds of fine green hue
South Sea Pearl drop. The gold is finished with our signature Hyderabadi polish for a lasting gleam.
features: These exquisite Jhumkas feature a captivating design with a teardrop emerald as an accent at the top and an intricate filigree jhumka framework. The intricate gold work showcases rows of diamonds set in a floral pattern. A single South Sea pearl dangles gracefully. The Jhumka's design reflects traditional Telugu artistry, perfect for adding a touch of South Indian grandeur to any look.
colors: and pearl white – a classic and regal combination.
occasions: or any celebration where you desire a touch of traditional elegance. This pairs well with Kanjeevaram and Gadwal silk sarees.
description: These Jhumkas are not just earrings, they're a legacy. Handcrafted by skilled artisans, this set blends the timeless appeal of South Indian jewelry with contemporary design sensibilities. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and pearls creates a dazzling effect, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability. It’s a heirloom piece that will be cherished for generations to come.
